site_title: FF7 Buster Sword by Wilson Lee

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This model is an origami Buster Sword from Final Fantasy VII ( FF7 ) designed by yours truly, me, Wilson Lee @Heap Art. I was drawn into the Final Fantasy video game series after my first taste of Final Fantasy VIII ( FF8 ). I simply love the artwork and story telling. I was inspired to design this origami Buster Sword after posting the foldable Knife tutorial! I hope you'll like this video as mush as I did designing the model. Enjoy!!! This is a slow version. Check out the Quickie Version here : https://youtu.be/EZ_GcFogxRI Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
